lead_paragraph: Prosecutors say a United Nations Development Program engineer used his position to provide material assistance to the Islamist group and its military wing.

byline.contributor: Moushira Jammal contributed reporting from Gaza City, and Isabel Kershner and Myra Noveck from Jerusalem.

headline.print_headline: Israel Says U.N. Worker  Aided Hamas in Gaza
headline.main: Israel Accuses U.N. Worker of Aiding Hamas in Gaza

snippet: Prosecutors say a United Nations Development Program engineer used his position to provide material assistance to the Islamist group and its military wing....
abstract: Israeli prosecutors charge Waheed Al Bursh, Palestinian employee of United Nations in Gaza Strip, with providing material assistance to Hamas; accusations follow similar charges leveled against Palestinian employee of World Vision; indictments raise questions about network of humanitarian groups operating in Gaza.
